name: Love Project: A Long Distance Relationship
name_original: Love Project: A Long Distance Relationship
description:
After spending a year together in love at Turkey, Bryan had to go to United States to continue his education there.

From the day 1, they both knew that Bryan was planning to go to U.S. for continuing his education. They were scared but they thought they could overcome this anyway.

When the time was up, it was such a dreading moment for both Bryan & Libby. However they were dedicated to this relationship. They will make it work and meet at Europe at the end of first year spent in U.S.

Only they had to do was, keep their love fresh and at the same time work towards their own goals. #multiplayer #platform #other #strategy #unity
